solution_line_template: She needs {num_guest_sets} sets of guest towels that are ${guest_set_price} each so that's {num_guest_sets}*{guest_set_price} = $<<{num_guest_sets}*{guest_set_price}={guest_total}>>{guest_total}

She needs {num_master_sets} sets of master bath towels that are ${master_set_price} each so that's {num_master_sets}*{master_set_price} = $<<{num_master_sets}*{master_set_price}={master_total}>>{master_total}

The store is offering 20% off of her ${towels_total} towels so that's {towels_total}*{discount_percent_decimal} = $<<{towels_total}*{discount_percent_decimal}={discount_amount}>>{discount_amount} discount
Her ${towels_total} towels have a ${discount_amount} discount making them {towels_total}-{discount_amount} =$<<{towels_total}-{discount_amount}={final_total}>>{final_total}
